title: Co-Operation Management - CeBeNetwork GmbH
segmentation: I'm from the CB network company.
We are based in Bremen mainly.
We operating a network of more than 30 companies by now which is still growing and miss.
You can see on this map we are our partner.

Companies are based almost all over Europe or main customer is Airbus as you maybe can see here in this slides Airbus has sites in France and Germany and the UK and in Spain and that's our approach to be present at this site as well.
The network contains more than 5000 highly skilled engineers, which are not all active in the aerospace industry, but most of them.
We assume network are prime contractor to Airbus.
We're delivering delivering engineering services to them.
We as well do deliver IT services which is very close to engineering services.
Envious web provide on site experts forevers.
We are in the role on the one hand we are the broker of the network and on the other hand we are as well active in the engineering services.
So sometimes we have slight conflicts by providing services.

This other business areas we are active in which starts from testing and aerodynamics over computer aided engineering design, engineering process and technology management, software engineering and systems engineering.
This means that we are supplying almost the whole range of producing an airplane.
